style: body { background-image: linear-gradient(180deg, #0d1117 0%, #161b22 100%); } .SideNav-item { background-color: rgba(22, 27, 34, 0.6) !important; backdrop-filter: blur(10px); border: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1); border-radius: 12px; transition: all 0.3s ease; } .SideNav-item:hover { transform: translateY(-3px); box-shadow: 0 8px 24px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3); border-color: rgba(88, 166, 255, 0.4); } .avatar { border-radius: 50%; border: 2px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1); } img { border-radius: 8px; }
title: 樊筱晗的blog
subTitle: 小晗

P1.style: body { background-image: linear-gradient(180deg, #0d1117 0%, #161b22 100%); } .SideNav-item { background-color: rgba(22, 27, 34, 0.6) !important; backdrop-filter: blur(10px); border: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1); border-radius: 12px; transition: all 0.3s ease; } .SideNav-item:hover { transform: translateY(-3px); box-shadow: 0 8px 24px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3); border-color: rgba(88, 166, 255, 0.4); } .avatar { border-radius: 50%; border: 2px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1); } img { border-radius: 8px; }
